sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
Instructions for a young nobleman, or, The idea of a person of honour done out of French. Pour un jeune seigneur. English La Chétardie, Trotti de, chevalier, d. 1703. Spence, Ferrand.
[10], 84 p.
Printed for R. Bentley and S. Magnes ..., London : 1683.
Translation of: Pour un jeune seigneur. Written by Trotti de La Chétardie and translated by Ferrand Spence. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). First ed. in English. Cf. BM. Reproduction of original in British Library.
=======
Instructions for a young nobleman, or, The idea of a person of honour done out of French. Pour un jeune seigneur. English La Chétardie, Trotti de, chevalier, d. 1703. Spence, Ferrand.
[10], 84 p.
Printed for R. Bentley and S. Magnes ..., London : 1683.
Translation of: Pour un jeune seigneur. Written by Trotti de La Chétardie and translated by Ferrand Spence. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.). First ed. in English. Cf. BM. Reproduction of original in British Library.
R. Bentley
S. Magnes
